description.summary: Alleged secret underground UFO base beneath Dulce, New Mexico, claimed to be a joint US government-alien facility conducting human and genetic experiments. Despite extensive claims, no credible evidence has ever been produced.
description.full: Dulce Base is an alleged secret underground facility located beneath Archuleta Mesa near Dulce, New Mexico. According to conspiracy theories originating in the 1980s, the base is a joint operation between the US government and extraterrestrial beings, conducting horrific experiments on humans and animals in a seven-level underground complex. The claims primarily stem from Paul Bennewitz's UFO investigations in the late 1970s and Phil Schneider's sensational testimony in the 1990s. Despite extensive investigation by UFO researchers and journalists, no physical evidence, photographs, or credible documentation has ever been found to support the existence of this facility.

history.modern_era: The Dulce Base story persists in UFO conspiracy circles despite complete lack of evidence. No geological surveys, satellite imagery, or investigations have found any indication of underground facilities. Most researchers consider it either pure fiction or the result of disinformation campaigns.
